question: Democratic Presidential Candidate Bernie Sanders has claimed that 'Americans don't know that... almost all of the wealth rests in the hands of the few.' What percent of all the household wealth in the United States does the top 0.1% (that is, one in one thousand people) own?

How does President Barack Obama's current approval rating compare with the approval ratings of former President Ronald Reagan and former President George W. Bush at the same point in their presidencies?
options: Obama's approval rating is lower than Reagan's and lower than Bush's
Obama's approval rating is lower than Reagan's and the same (within 1%) as Bush's
Obama's approval rating is lower than Reagan's and higher than Bush's
Obama's approval rating is the same (within 1%) as Reagan's and higher than Bush's
Obama's approval rating is higher than Reagan's and higher than Bush's
